HOUSE.opening: Why ask me, is it becuase I am awesome, probably. Well I say
HOUSE.ending: will hold the answers you seek

HOUSE.opening: Well baked beans on a piece of toast, I think
HOUSE.ending: is where the good grub is at.

COMMENT.mean: Adam is not a friend of Shmebulock
COMMENT.nice: Adam is almsot as cool as Shmebulock, almost

COMMENT.mean: Shmebulock will refer to Ashley as thing, Shmebulock doesn't like thing
Would you like cheese with your whine sir, Billy complains a lot
COMMENT.nice: Billy always has his eye on the prize

COMMENT.mean: Brian looks like he is wearing a very poor costume of Shmebulock
COMMENT.nice: Brian may have stealth, but Shmebulock has style.

COMMENT.mean: Dave is Shmebulock's cousin, Shmebulock hates cousins
COMMENT.nice: Dave is Shmebulocks family, Shmebulock looks after his family

COMMENT.mean: Dennis thinks his muscles will intimidate Shmebulock, Shmebulock disagrees furiously
Shmebulock is better than the undepants fluff Diana finds betwixed her buttocks.
COMMENT.nice: Diana thinks Shmebulock is a king among men.

COMMENT.mean: Shmebulock does not understand the one called Geoff
Shmebulock needs to teach this Jennifer person a lesson
COMMENT.nice: I would happily invite Jennifer around to Shmebulock's evil lair.

COMMENT.mean: Jessica can not tame a man like Shmebulock, she does not have the intelligence
COMMENT.nice: Jessica is the woman for Shmebulock

COMMENT.mean: Katie is not on Shmebulock's christmas list
COMMENT.nice: In my experience Katie is a truth teller of the highest order
Kerry has never lied to Shmebulock, Shmebulock would know

COMMENT.mean: Shmebulock an Mort do no get on at all
Pat is simlair to his namesake which a cow produces
Shmebulock is not impressed buy the money possed by Rich.
COMMENT.nice: Shmebulock finds that Rich is very generous.

COMMENT.mean: Scooter thinks he is smart, Shmebulock is smarter
COMMENT.nice: Shmebulock respects the intelligence of Scooter.

COMMENT.mean: Shmebulock knows things about Susan, terrible things
COMMENT.nice: Shmebulock likes Susans outfit, though he is not sure why she wears it.

COMMENT.mean: Tifa is small potatoes, Shmebulock knows all
COMMENT.nice: Tifa makes Shmebulock feel all fuzzy inside

COMMENT.mean: Tom is unimportant, Only Shmebulock is important
COMMENT.nice: Shmebulock finds Tom to be worthy of Shmebulock's attention

RANDOM.comment: Why are you here? What gives you the right to enter the domain of Shmebulock
I've seen some stupid people in my time but you take the biscuit, dunk that biscuit, eat it and then take another
I'm sleepy and have just about given up, all hail Shmebulock
